content: > **please note** this pattern is also available for free in english on my blog > however by purchasing the printable > pdf at a low price you also support > me as a designer with your purchase > you will receive your choice between > two pdf files one is fully coloured > with photos and the other is a > simple black and white version with > no photos and just the essential information **elemental knitting series water glacia shawl** this is a series to help beginner knitters become more familiar with how their stitches work the idea is to have a series of four shawls which focus on a particular knitting element and use it to create a piece showcasing what those stitches can do the series will also have a theme of the elements of nature earth air fire and water which will connect with the project in the stitch pattern colour or other aspect s of the design the **glacia shawl** is the water elemental instalment of the series focusing on how increases and decreases create shape and texture in your work you can read more about how this all comes together and what the increases and decreases actually do for this shawl here on my reveal post 1 1 http //www canadutch nl/wordpress/archives/17539
